creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: robed figure seated on rock over small waves with moonlike halo; sprig of bamboo in vase at L; waterfall at L; cliff and branches above

title: White-robed Kannon
